law.catch_line: Notwithstanding § 4-301(b)(1) or § 4-302 of this article, a circuit court has exclusive, original ...
law.text: Notwithstanding § 4-301(b)(1) or § 4-302 of this article, a circuit court has exclusive, original jurisdiction over a misdemeanor under Title 8, Subtitle 5 of this article.
